turkish_example_sentence: Biz o geniş araziye sahip olmuşsak, modern çiftlik kurarız.
english_example_sentence: If we had owned that vast land, we would have built a modern farm.
russian_example_sentence: Если бы мы владели той обширной землёй, мы бы построили современную ферму.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Biz o geniş araziye ______, modern çiftlik kurarız.
